I'm Webby, you personal training bot for software development.
Software design principles are a set of guidelines that helps developers to make a good system design. The most important principle is the SOLID principle.
In software engineering, a software design pattern is a general, reusable solution to a commonly occurring problem within a given context in software design.
Front End development is a style of computer programming that focuses on the coding and creation of elements and features of a website that will then be seen by the user.
Back End development is a style of computer programming that focuses on building and maintaining the mechanisms that process data and perform actions on websites.
Full Stack development refers to the development of both front end(client side) and back end(server side) portions of web application.

patterns: Can you recommend some books on backend development
What books can i use to learn backend
responses:
I recommend you read these books:

1. The Joy of PHP: A Beginner's Guide to Programming Interactive Web Applications with PHP and mySQL
2. PHP & MySQL: Server-side Web Development
3. Beginning Node.js

patterns: Can you recommend some books on frontend development
What books can i use to learn frontend
responses:
I recommend you read these books:

1. HTML and CSS: Design and build websites, by Jon Duckett
2. JavaScript and JQuery: Interactive Front-End Web Development, by Jon Duckett
3. The Road to React: Your journey to master React.js in JavaScript

patterns: How can I improve my coding skills?
How can I up my coding game
can you recommend me any books to improve my programming skills?
responses:
I would advise you to learn about the following topics:

1. Design Principles and Design Patterns, I recommend these books:
	a) Head First Design Patterns: A Brain-Friendly Guide
	b) Design Patterns: Elements of Reusable Object-Oriented Software
2. Craftsmanship, I strongly recommend this book:
	   Clean Code: A Handbook of Agile Software Craftsmanship
3. Data Structures and Algorithms, I recommend these books
	a) The Algorithm Design Manual
	b) Algorithms by Robert Sedgewick & Kevin Wayne

patterns: Can you recommend some books on fullstack development
What books can i use to learn fullstack
responses:
I recommend you read these books:
	1. Full-Stack React Projects: Learn MERN stack development by building modern web apps using MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js
	2. Hands-On Full Stack Development with Spring Boot 2 and React: Build modern and scalable full stack applications using Spring Framework 5 and React with Hooks
	3. Quick Start Full Stack Web Development: Build Secure Asynchronous Single-Page Apps with Flask, React, and PostgreSQL
	4. Full-Stack Vue.js 2 and Laravel 5: Bring the frontend and backend together with Vue, Vuex, and Laravel
Web development, also known as website development, refers to the tasks associated with creating, building, and maintaining websites and web applications that run online on a browser.

patterns: How can I learn web development?
responses: To learn about development you can choose to learn back end development, front end development, or both (full stack development)
Programming is the process of creating a set of instructions that tell a computer how to perform a task.

patterns: How do I become a programmer
responses:
To learn programming I recommend that you first choose a language based on what you want to pursue and stick with it until you master it. Here are the following options:
	1.Java - mainly used for enterprise application development, android application development and big-data techonlogies
	2.Python - mainly used for AI, machine learning, data science
	3.Javascript - used for web development and games that run on the web
	4.C# - mainly used for web development, desktop application development and game-development
	5.PHP - used for web development
	6.C++ - used for embedded systems and game development
A database is an organized collection of structured information, or data, typically stored electronically in a computer system.

patterns: How can i become a database developer
How can i become a database administrator
responses:
I advise you to learn the following topics:

1. RDBMS(Relational Database Management Systems) terms and concepts
2. SQL(Structured Query Language)
